Andrew Kuzmin

Multidisciplinary self-taught designer and artist with 10+ years of experience. Mostly I do branding, packaging, 3D & AI, motion design, typography and web. Had deal with: Fuck You Digital, GUNNA, Kinopoisk, Lena Kuka, Labelcom, Omsky Studio, Raiffesien Bank, Samokat, Sber, Shuka Design, Tinkoff Bank, Yandex.
